BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.BlockRam.blockRam#
BlackBox.type:
blockRam#
  :: ( KnownDomain dom conf   ARG[0]
     , HasCallStack  --       ARG[1]
     , Undefined a ) --       ARG[2]
  => Clock dom       -- clk,  ARG[3]
  -> Enable dom      -- en,   ARG[4]
  -> Vec n a         -- init, ARG[5]
  -> Signal dom Int  -- rd,   ARG[6]
  -> Signal dom Bool -- wren, ARG[7]
  -> Signal dom Int  -- wr,   ARG[8]
  -> Signal dom a    -- din,  ARG[9]
  -> Signal dom a
